1.0.name: wordpress/vertically-responsive-images
1.0.description: Usually when we talk about making something responsive, we mean horizontally. But it's annoying when tall images overflow a short laptop screen. This resizes those images on the fly to fit the user's window. Optionally disable it for individual images by adding a do-not-resize class.
